location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 76 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of Mr Secretary Greenhill's despatch No.938 and forwarding a translation of a letter from the Imam of Muscat (Saʻīd bin Sulṭān) which had previously been omitted.Translation of a letter from the Imam of Muscat to Colonel Stannus, Resident at Bushire, dated Ramadan (no day, exact date given), regarding Shaik Abdool Russool (Shaikh ‘Abd al-Rasūl Khān); a request from Stannus for timely information should the Imam decide to adopt hostile measures against him; and the letter being the Imam's compliance informing him that he intended act against him and his dependents in twenty days from the date of the letter
